casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwan ANTHONY 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 22, 2017 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, Jonathan E. Broun, Attorney at Law, Kathryn L. VandeBerg, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Anthony, Antwan. Kimberly Robb, Assistant District Attorney, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of August 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of August 2017."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 20th day of September 2017 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
